I'm

Software Developer

Hello, I'm Lee Jia Jie. I'm an individual driven by a passion for technology, a knack for learning, and a love for video games.

My educational journey took me through Pei Chun High School in Pontian Besar, Johor, from 2014 to 2019, where I laid the foundation for my future endeavors. My hobbies include immersing myself in the world of video games, whether it's on my PC or mobile phone. But my interests extend beyond gaming. I'm also enthusiastic about learning various programming languages and continually enhancing my skills in this dynamic field. My objective is simple yet profound: to apply the knowledge and skills I've acquired during my college education in a real-world job. I'm committed to contributing my service and determination to be an asset to your company throughout my tenure. I eagerly anticipate the opportunity to merge my passion for technology, love for learning, and dedication to your organization's success. Let's connect and explore how I can be a valuable addition to your team.
